projects.title: Online Voting System using Blockchain
description: Online voting enables voters to cast their vote privately and easily from any location and on any device with internet access.
This enables election officials to assure that their votes remain cast-as-intended, recorded-as-cast and counted-as-recorded.

projects.title: HireVista: Talent Recruitment Platform
description: A recruitment platform for job posting, application tracking, and status updates.
Optimized API interactions with Swagger, ensuring clear documentation and maintainable endpoints.
Visualized hiring metrics using Chart.js, aiding data-driven decision-making for recruitment processes.

projects.title: GeminiUnifiedReview
description: Developed an Android app that consolidates product reviews and ratings from multiple sources using image recognition
Integrated Google Gemini API for efficient product information retrieval from product images
Implemented real-time data fetching with intuitive UI for seamless user experience

projects.title: Network Science Analysis Tool
description: Developed a comprehensive network analysis tool implementing various graph algorithms and visualization techniques
Analyzed complex networks including Karate Club and Football datasets using NetworkX library
Created interactive visualizations and metrics for network topology analysis
